Header.title: Centurion Gaming
Header.paragraph: Centurion Gaming will be the first professional-grade esports training facility focused on taking our players to the collegiate and professional levels. We will provide our players with the tools to grow themselves, their mindset, and their ability to perform on the many stages to come.

About.paragraph: Centurion Gaming will be the first professional-grade esports training facility focused on taking our players to the collegiate and professional levels. We will provide our players with the tools to grow themselves, their mindset, and their ability to perform on the many stages to come. Modern esports training looks beyond the endless in-game practice sessions to realize the potential of organized and structured coaching and training. Our approach to player growth involves mental and physical wellness exercises, teamwork and leadership training, and individual development programs.

Services.name: Pre-Season
Services.subtext: Our pre-season program is designed to ensure teams and players are ready to perform when the season begins. Our coaches are passionate about getting in early and setting a strong, sustainable foundation for success. We will be working to set a precedent for all of our players regarding what it takes to be a part of our program. Individual training and team bootcamps will be available along with the regularly scheduled practices.

Services.name: In-Season
Services.subtext: Seasons are full of ups and downs. The Centurion coaches are ready to encourage and teach players to perform their best under pressure and this all starts before the first game. We will be using performance optimization techniques such as mental skills training (to deal with stress and performance anxiety), individual and team communication, and providing the whole organization with a culture of pursuing excellence.

Services.name: Game Time
Services.subtext: When it comes to showtime, we’ve got our players covered. We understand the highs and lows of competition and provide our players with the support needed to mitigate external factors and pressure. Our coaches are prepared to provide mental preparation exercises to deal with the stress and pressure that can come with performing in games, tournaments, or in front of a crowd. We give on the spot game analysis, breaking down the peaks and pitfalls of the recent games performance and provide quick fixes for upcoming matches as well as team performance management to make sure all players are working together as well as at their individual potentials.

Services.name: Year-Round
Services.subtext: Better humans make for better esports athletes. At the core of every esports athlete is a human being. At Centurion Gaming, we help fuel personal growth by guiding individuals to become more confident and healthier human beings, which sets the foundation for achieving their performance potential as esports athletes. By introducing a new lifestyle we want to enhance and maintain their physical and mental wellness across all aspects of their lives—both inside and outside of the gaming environment. We do away with the hours of mindlessly grinding away at a game and focus on consolidated focus practice. We will push for optimized sleep and nutrition as well as academic excellence.
